WRITING.TITLE: 8:11 AM 3/4/19
WRITING.TEXT: Too much of a good thing has left me numb and melancholic. I feel absolutely worthless and dumb. I bother him so much. All the time, I #8217;m like a never ceasing crying child that won #8217;t shut up. I bet even my friends think I #8217;m a kiss-ass too. I came in early to make some buttons for the art club fail sale. The only reason I #8217;m trying is because I committed a long time ago. And that girl on newspaper interviewed me. I don #8217;t even know if I can get Erin to help me during lunch. I made my buttons and I forgot to ask him if we had permission to sell stuff until last night. I made him go all the way to the office for my stupid sale idea that will never profit. He asked me if I could explain the difference between digital design and graphic design and I failed miserably. I #8217;m a useless sack of garbage who can #8217;t even speak coherently. He probably thinks I #8217;m just a sad, useless loser now. I was going to #8220;anonymously #8221; donate some money to the sale so it would look like I actually accomplished something but now I #8217;m broke. I didn #8217;t get the scholarship. Any scholarship at all. Hell, even 100$ would have helped a ton. I cried for two solid hours straight and my eyes stung for the next two days. All that work for NOTHING. Maybe it was my portfolio, maybe it was my recommendation letter, maybe my statement of intent, or maybe they don #8217;t want a cis-gendered white female that doesn #8217;t draw cartoons and isn #8217;t very political. Milla hasn #8217;t even gotten an email yet and I bet that means she got a scholarship. If SHE got one, then I #8217;m definitely doing something wrong. I did the math and I cant pay $2,900 by June 1st. It #8217;s going to take a miracle if I want to go. I #8217;m going to call today or sometime this week and find out about payment plans and options. I don #8217;t want to disappoint Milla or Fink. I just want to run to the bathroom and cry and bang my head on the wall until I pass out. Everything looks bleak. I #8217;m an utter failure who can #8217;t do anything right. I just passed Erin in the hall and asked about him helping me with the sale during lunch and he looked confused thinking it was just on Wednesday. I hate myself. I want to smash my head and just die. I #8217;m gonna have to convince Mrs. H to let me take all three lunches. I hate myself. If I didn #8217;t have art, I #8217;d kill myself. I just want to do a good job for once.

WRITING.TITLE: 9:07 PM 3/4/19
WRITING.TEXT: Some thoughts; I #8217;m still the same old sack of shit. After all my drama this morning, things worked out fine like they always do on Mondays. Why did I doubt myself or anyone else? The sale went better than expected, class was alright, zine club was great. Yet I #8217;m lying on my bed like a lump of fat with 27 bleeding cuts on my left thigh. I called the CE office and found out that even if I do smaller payments, it #8217;s still gotta be in my June 1st. Now I #8217;m really screwed. Working overtime is not an option, and I #8217;m deathly scared to tell dad I didn #8217;t get the scholarship. He won #8217;t ever understand how much this means to me. Fink suggested writing a grant proposal to the PTA. Apparently they don #8217;t often get grant requests from students, so I #8217;m hoping I have some chances. I don #8217;t want to write something TOO pretentious, but I really need that money. The last thing I want to do is get my hopes up. Because the second I do, according to Murphy #8217;s law, that grant goes straight to the trash. Not going to this camp or college seems really appealing to me right now. But this is my only path to success. But who needs success anyways? My dream life is living in some trailer park where the winters aren #8217;t 2 degrees, and where I can live in peace and draw for the rest of my days. Anyways, today was alright, as far as days of the week go. I wish this whole camp thing wasn #8217;t looming over me. I need to talk to dad ASAP. But I want to write a rough draft for my grant proposal before Fink leaves for his conference or whatever. I #8217;m so glad he asked me what was wrong. Wish he would have done that 4 months ago.

WRITING.TITLE: 10:01 PM 3/5/19
WRITING.TEXT: I love how every day of my life is just one mood-swinging rollercoaster anymore. The sale went well today. Made 33$. That #8217;s a total of about 50$ so far. Which I #8217;m honestly surprised about. I stressed about writing a grant and came up with an outline and later found out that it #8217;s pointless to write one to the PTA for something like this. That ruined me. I came to terms with not being able to go to the camp that hour, and I cried it out and was just really depressed the rest of class. I went to the bathroom right before the bell because I had to cry and shit like a pathetic loser, and I came back to grab my bag and on the way Milla said that Fink wanted to talk to me, and I was like, what?? So I went in sheepishly and he was like Oh Syd, I need to talk to you. I shrugged and continued to be sad. I technically should have been in the basement taking my math test but screw that. I #8217;m already failing anyways. He told me to walk with him because he had a meeting to go to. And HOLY COW. This man is the nicest and most caring person I have ever met (but I already knew that anyways.) He genuinely cares about ME. Stupid old me who really isn #8217;t that great of an artist anyways but is obsessed with pleasing him. He said that there is another school fund that might be available to help. I was a little sheepish when I found out I #8217;d have to directly talk to someone in person. I #8217;m pretty bad at that and he knows it. I thanked him, and went down to sit by the painting room waiting for dad. Logan came around the corner and we started talking and I opened up about the whole camp situation. He was sick yesterday so had no clue. I cried and whines like a sad little artsy bitch. I hate myself sometimes. But he #8217;s so understanding! I love him aaaa. I was SO SCARED to talk to dad about any of this. I just didn #8217;t think I #8217;d know how. But tonight was a miracle. Anyways, when I got home, I had already come to the decision I wouldn #8217;t go to the camp. I was disappointed but life would continue. I wrote a long text to Fink explaining that there #8217;s no way I #8217;m gonna be able to go, and that I really appreciate how much he #8217;s trying to help me. He wrote me back while I was at work saying that he wants me to make smart decisions and stuff and that he wants to do everything in his power to help. I am so thankful for him. I don #8217;t know where I would be without all that he #8217;s done for me. I decided then I #8217;d try to go still. I #8217;ll do everything in my power. We went to IKEA after I got off work. Dad was in a good mood, we all were. It was a miracle. IKEA always does that to him for some odd reason. Anyways, we got home and I hung around in the basement waiting for my opportunity to talk about the camp and my situation. IT WENT SURPRISINGLY WELL! He doesn #8217;t seem absolutely opposed to it like before! Maybe it #8217;s because I gave him a lot more info or something, or maybe it was the IKEA frozen yogurt in his stomach. Regardless, things look brighter for sure. I need to decide ASAP. I want to pay the 300$ deposit by Friday or sooner. My stupid reddit diary entries sound so fake. I kind of wish I #8217;d just spit out everything that came to my mind, but I #8217;m not sure that #8217;s for the best long term. I just think that every day is important, no matter how great or bad. And there are thousands and thousands of days in my past I have absolutely no recollection of that I wish I could remember.

WRITING.TITLE: 3:39 PM 3/6/19
WRITING.TEXT: Now I #8217;ve really done it. I didn #8217;t even get to tell him I changed my mind and decided not to give up. I hate myself. A whole 11 days without seeing or hearing from him. I sound like a desperate creep, I #8217;m just so dependent on his approval, I don #8217;t know who or what I am without it. IM SUCH AN IDIOT! I should have told him about last night. I feel like I #8217;ve failed him. Winter break was bad enough, but spring break is gonna be hell. I don #8217;t know how to convince dad. Gotta gage what kind of mood he #8217;s in first. I really wanna bruise myself, but I like cutting, I only bruise so that he might ask. Peace out void #129304;

WRITING.TITLE: 8:32 AM 3/7/19
WRITING.TEXT: Milla isn #8217;t even going to go to the camp anymore. Her mom wants her to go to some painting class in Switzerland. Knowing her, I know that #8217;s what she #8217;d pick, but I am going to be SO lonely. I paid the deposit last night and switched my major to printmaking. I hope it will be beneficial. I don #8217;t know what I want to do with my life anymore, obviously art, but WHAT exactly?? Things are going crazy and I just want to cry. I #8217;m trying to have a positive outlook on things but it #8217;s so hard. I wanna lose weight before the camp. Mostly so I #8217;ll have more pants and shorts to fit into, and also no one wants to be friends with the fat kid. Now I #8217;m gonna eat diet Apple Jacks for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Woohoo.

WRITING.TITLE: 8:06 PM 3/7/19
WRITING.TEXT: A shift in my life is approaching and I don #8217;t know what it will be or how it will play out. I #8217;ve had these senses before. The last time was 6 months before mom died. I knew I #8217;d lose someone important to me that year and I wasn #8217;t wrong. I knew it the second I got back in the car that day. I #8217;ve got some sort of super intuition. Things are going to change. Soon, but not too soon. I #8217;m going to realize something about myself or life that will change everything. I can feel it. My life is some sick system of cycles inside of bigger cycles that move at different speeds and at different sizes. Everything repeats itself. We are just too blind to see. I need to track it. I need concrete proof for myself. Things haven #8217;t felt real lately. I feel like I #8217;m floating through time or I #8217;ve drifted into some alternate state. I don #8217;t feel at home in my room, I never know what day it is. The idea of work sickens me. The uncertainty of the future scares me more than anything. School felt like school today, a feeling I haven #8217;t felt in months, even a year. I need Fink, he takes my mind of the numbness of life. #8220;I #8217;m worth it. #8221; He said. How can I be worth it? I #8217;m worth nothing, I #8217;m not even good enough to get even a partial scholarship to a stupid high school art camp. What does that say about me now? Am I really worth it? Or is it because I #8217;m a kiss-ass who is obsessed with his praise and approval? Would he think the same of me if he realized how much I think of him? He #8217;s the father figure I #8217;ve always needed. My own has left me alone with years of bottled emotions and feelings. I #8217;m beginning to understand what mom went through. If dad knew what went on in my head he would treat me like her. Fink doesn #8217;t do that to me. He #8217;s the one adult in my life who sees people from the heart instead of clouded judgement like my father. He understands empathy, the most important thing a person can have. It helps we agree on most everything when it comes to art, and he shares that same passion for it I do. He #8217;s just had more time to make it. But he CARES. More than anyone I #8217;ve ever seen. And it #8217;s genuine. There aren #8217;t a lot of genuines in my life. I want to make him proud with who I am and what I create because he understands in a way my dad doesn #8217;t. I still think about the day I cried on the bus when we passed where we used to live and where I found out mom died. He noticed something was up and when I got back to class to grab my bags he caught me in the hallway before I left. He asked me what was wrong and I couldn #8217;t tell him the full truth. I don #8217;t know if I #8217;ll ever be able to tell him. I just said it was hard going by there and I said #8220;I #8217;m sorry #8221; a hundred times like an idiot. And then he hugged me. And it was the first time I #8217;d felt safe and understood since mom died. He will never know how much I needed that hug. He will never know how much he means to me and I hate myself for not expressing my gratitude enough. He saved me. I had hit rock bottom by December. My self harm was at its worst. And it wasn #8217;t until school started again and I had two whole classes with him that I started becoming happy again. Things are going good overall. Obviously I #8217;m still a mess but I #8217;ve always been a mess. It #8217;s just been a pretty big mess this week that #8217;s all. I don #8217;t want to think about mom or Fink right now. I kind of got off on a tangent again. I seem to have a problem with that. I just gotta make it to Sunday. Then I can relax for a few days.

WRITING.TITLE: 4:20 PM 3/8/19
WRITING.TEXT: Things don #8217;t feel real. I #8217;m SO tired all the time. I just fell asleep in the middle of the afternoon. That never happens. I n eeed to wake up. I need to go to work. Today sucked. I #8217;ll never remember this day ever. Doesn #8217;t that make you sad. How much of our lives are forgotten, or pushed into our dormant minds? Anyways, I should get ready. I have to take care of myself this week.

WRITING.TITLE: 10:26 PM 3/8/19
WRITING.TEXT: He replied to my story, #8220;YAY, Go Me!! #128588; #8221; I don #8217;t know what to feel. I saw the notification and smiled and smiled but I feel so much guilt. I feel guilty about not being excited about going. I #8217;m so used to pushing my hopes down low so I won #8217;t be disappointed. I don #8217;t even know what expectations are real anymore. I need to figure out a payment system with dad real quick or else things could get messy. I need this camp. It #8217;ll get me into college easier. It #8217;ll set me up for my future. But I can #8217;t help thinking, what if the teachers are shitty? What if my roommate is annoying? What if I don #8217;t learn a single new thing? What if dad won #8217;t let me go when he finds out there might be nude figure models? What if he won #8217;t let me go because Milla can #8217;t? What if I get sick? What if I can #8217;t draw good? What if I #8217;m not the best? I hate myself. Why am I so anxious and paranoid? Why can #8217;t I be a happier person? Why can #8217;t I just be cool for once? Why am I so high maintenance? I feel the hundreds of scars beneath my pants and I wonder why I stopped. Was it boredom, or have I gotten better? All of my friends are so open about their issues and share their accomplishments with the world every day. And I #8217;m proud of them, and I never think of them wrongly when they do. Yet whenever I put myself out there, I feel as though I #8217;m wasting peoples time. I wish I #8217;d learn to take a compliment. I #8217;m trying, but it feels so unnatural. Tomorrow I work a day of my life away. Every Saturday. Every week. Down the drain for money. Money I #8217;ve spent because I couldn #8217;t learn contentment. But I won #8217;t complain. I #8217;m lucky to have my job. It #8217;s definitely not the best possible one, but it #8217;s all I #8217;ve known. Anyways, I should sleep. My sleep cycle is wack because I #8217;ve been going to bed so late recently.
That #8217;s why I journal. I hate having my life just be wasted away. It #8217;s just nice to be able to remember. To try and track the otherwise untrackable.

WRITING.TITLE: 10:11 PM 3/9/19
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;ve come to terms with expecting a normal life. I think most people have in a way. Normal for me means a steady job that isn #8217;t physically exhausting, being able to make and sell my art on the side, and an apartment that isn #8217;t falling apart. That #8217;s all I need in life to be happy. A family would be nice too, but isn #8217;t necessary. I can accomplish this without being a high school art prodigy. However, I desperately want to go to college, and the only way I #8217;ll make it is if I get good scholarships. I need to build my brand now. Become a recognized name amongst the local art scene. Then I #8217;m sure to get great scholarships. I don #8217;t know why I #8217;m writing this because it sounds so pretentious, and I already know this stuff by heart, but I need to remember that things will be okay. I #8217;ve always adapted to change and tragedy. I can make it. I just can #8217;t help but feel guilty when I sit around all day. I know that I need to set aside days to do that without feeling guilty, but I just can #8217;t shake the guilt. Whatever. I #8217;m exhausted, just worked for 10 hours on my feet. All I know is that I need a job where I #8217;m not on my feet all day when I #8217;m out of college.... if I go to college.
God I wish I could tell my favorite teacher about my self harm. I just can #8217;t. He #8217;d tell my parents, and he #8217;d never see me the same. You #8217;re lucky, you should just talk to him!
